title: Tangramation
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, John Bird and Alister MacGregor
brief_description: Tangra is an ancient game from China; a square is divided into seven pieces from which an amazing range of figures and shapes can be constructed, from a house to a horse, from a bird to a boat. This short film explores some of the possibilities of this fascinating activity.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, John Bird and Alister MacGregor
